item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 13th December
item.description:
A tree has broken/fallen on the left side as you drive up Birdlip Hill. A branch is poking out into the road. When cars are coming the other way, a large vehicle cannot avoid hitting the branch. Please can it be removed/cut back
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Oak Avenue, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham

item.title: Blocked drain by construction traffic, 13th December
item.description:
///argued.weekend.hiring The drain has been completely blocked by the grass verge that was crushed on top of it by the tarmac repair traffic that has just been in the village. The drain was cleaned out about two weeks ago, but is now completely obscured.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Main Street, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
